channel.title: FreePromptHub - Business & Professional Prompts
channel.description: Latest Business & Professional AI prompts from FreePromptHub

item.title: Product Launch Plan - Business Prompt | FreePromptHub
item.description: Launch your product with a bang. Get a complete launch plan with timeline, marketing tactics, and first-day sales strategies.

item.title: Project Planning Template - Business Prompt | FreePromptHub
item.description: Create project plans that actually get followed. Break down complex projects into doable steps with realistic timelines.

item.title: Sales Script Generator - Business Prompt | FreePromptHub
item.description: Close more deals with sales scripts that handle objections and guide conversations to yes. Stop winging it and start winning.

item.title: Social Media Content Calendar Prompt - Business | FreePromptHub
item.description: Social Media Content Calendar Generator that creates 30 days of engaging posts, stories, and campaigns across all platforms to grow your following and drive sales.

item.title: Team Update Writer - Business Prompt | FreePromptHub
item.description: Write team updates that people actually read. Keep everyone aligned without boring them to death.

item.title: Partnership Proposal Generator - Business Prompt | FreePromptHub
item.description: Create partnership proposals that get yes. Structure win-win deals that benefit both businesses and actually get signed.

item.title: Performance Review Writer - Business Prompt | FreePromptHub
item.description: Write performance reviews that actually help employees improve. Give feedback that motivates instead of deflates.

item.title: Pricing Strategy Calculator - Business Prompt | FreePromptHub
item.description: Set prices that maximize profit without losing customers. This pricing strategy prompt helps you find the sweet spot for your products or services.

item.title: Job Posting Writer - Business Prompt | FreePromptHub
item.description: Write job postings that attract A-players, not time wasters. Get qualified candidates who actually want the job.

item.title: Marketing Strategy Generator Prompt - Business | FreePromptHub
item.description: Marketing Strategy Generator prompt that creates a complete marketing plan with tactics, channels, budgets, and KPIs tailored to your business.

item.title: Meeting Agenda Creator - Business Prompt | FreePromptHub
item.description: Run meetings that don't waste time. Create agendas that keep discussions focused and actually get decisions made.

item.title: Sales Email Template Generator Prompt - Business | FreePromptHub
item.description: Sales Email Template Generator that creates personalized cold outreach, follow-up, and nurture emails that actually get responses and convert.

item.title: Employee Onboarding Plan - Business Prompt | FreePromptHub
item.description: Create employee onboarding that gets new hires productive fast. Stop losing good people in their first 90 days.

item.title: Hiring Interview Questions - Business Prompt | FreePromptHub
item.description: Hire the right people with interview questions that reveal who candidates really are. Stop bad hires before they happen.

item.title: Business Contract Generator - Business Prompt | FreePromptHub
item.description: Create contracts that protect your business without expensive lawyers. Get paid and avoid disputes with clear agreements.

item.title: One-Page Business Plan Creator Prompt - Business | FreePromptHub
item.description: One-Page Business Plan Creator prompt that generates a clear, actionable business plan perfect for startups, investors, and strategic planning.

item.title: Cold Email Templates - Business Prompt | FreePromptHub
item.description: Write cold emails that get responses, not spam folders. Turn strangers into customers with proven outreach templates.

item.title: Competitor Analysis Framework Prompt - Business | FreePromptHub
item.description: Competitor Analysis Framework prompt that reveals your competition's strategies, weaknesses, and opportunities to help you dominate your market.

item.title: Customer Complaint Response - Business Prompt | FreePromptHub
item.description: Turn angry customers into loyal fans with this customer complaint response prompt. Handle negative reviews and complaints professionally.

item.title: Customer Survey Creator - Business Prompt | FreePromptHub
item.description: Create customer surveys that people actually complete. Get feedback that improves your business, not just vanity metrics.
